com.service.service.login.rest.client

Interface ILoginServerValidateUserAuthenticationClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoginServerValidateUserAuthenticationClientImpl

    public interface ILoginServerValidateUserAuthenticationClient
    This interface provides the functionality to validate User Authentication against Login Server
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean validateUserAuthenticationAgainstLoginServer(ServiceSession appLoginServerSession, java.lang.String kerberosServiceSessionID, java.lang.String userLoginServiceSession)
      Returns true if user is authenticated else false
